text.div:
ActionRequiredBehavior

Defines requiredness behavior for selecting an action or an action group

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/action-required-behavior defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
must MustAn action with this behavior must be included in the actions processed by the end user; the end user may not choose not to include this action
could CouldAn action with this behavior may be included in the set of actions processed by the end user
must-unless-documented Must Unless DocumentedAn action with this behavior must be included in the set of actions processed by the end user, unless the end user provides documentation as to why the action was not included

name: ActionRequiredBehavior
description: Defines requiredness behavior for selecting an action or an action group

concept.definition: An action with this behavior must be included in the actions processed by the end user; the end user may not choose not to include this action
An action with this behavior may be included in the set of actions processed by the end user
An action with this behavior must be included in the set of actions processed by the end user, unless the end user provides documentation as to why the action was not included
